data.text:
@Dr_D_Robertson So you’re quiet for 2 months, BUT a slight uptick and here’s ‘The Fear’ again.
Should we 
- Lockdown?
- put kids in masks?
- sacrifice our youngest to the covid gods ?
@Dr_D_Robertson The 7 day average for HA has risen 8 out of the last 9 days in Englang. Cases are rising and testing falling.

@AM66680493 @Dr_D_Robertson Might be a data artefact. For reasons I cannot imagine but are probably recording behaviour, the first and last day of the month often seem to see an uptick in admission numbers. Those two days (28th Feb, 1st March) just got added to the chart. Definitely worth watching though.
@Dr_D_Robertson Why do you think this is? Vaccine waning?
